Logo is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more . You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want without a single commercial – all for one low monthly price.

Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from US$7.99 to US$11.99 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.

This depends on which plan you choose and what suits you best. If you choose the standard plan, you can watch on a multitude of devices such as smartphones, tablets, laptop, smart TV, gaming consoles and media boxes.

We’d love you to stay but if you decide to leave, it’s easy. You can instantly cancel your subscription anytime from your profile. No commitments. No risk. If you need assistance, our friendly team are always happy to help: chat.showmax.com

You can ensure that your product listing has complete and correct title, author/artist/actor, and subject information. This information helps customers easily find items they will want to purchase in our store.
